name: Clicker Royale (Maxence Jacquot)
description:
/!\ Use the fullscreen button on the bottom right /!\

Hello there ! 

This is Clicker Royale my submission for the Juice Jam : https://itch.io/jam/gdb-juice-jam

The theme was: Don't Stop

I Went for don't stop clicking

I had some last-minute display issues on the windows and HTML version so be sure to play them fullscreen.

 The Android version is fully functional so please download it :)
